constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Claremont Road Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 22/03656/HOU (Erection of first floor rear extension, conversion of garage into habitable space and changes to fenestration). Amendment to add ground floor window to side elevation.
decision_conditions: In respect of condition 1 of application reference 22/03656/HOU,The following plans: 200 Proposed Ground Floor Plan Approved 05.01.2023212 Proposed Side Elevation Approved 05.01.2023are replaced by:200 Rev A - Proposed Ground Floor Plan Received 11.10.2023212 Rev A - Proposed Side Elevation Received 11.10.2023Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
